languages.text: This bloodthirsty creature hunts for {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} but hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} every time {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is dealt to it. If 2 or more creatures of the same kind are adjacent to it, the creature becomes fearless and stops hiding.
languages.original_text: Это кровожадное существо охотится на {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добычу{/g}, но, когда ему наносят {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, прячется в укрытии в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Однако если на соседних клетках находятся 2 и более существ того же вида, это существо становится бесстрашным и перестает искать укрытия.

traits.locale_text: This bloodthirsty creature hunts for prey but hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} every time damage is dealt to it. If 2 or more creatures of the same kind are adjacent to it, the creature becomes fearless and stops hiding.

This bloodthirsty creature hunts for {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} but hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} every time {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is dealt to it. If 2 or more creatures of the same kind are adjacent to it, the creature becomes fearless and stops hiding.

languages.text: Это кровожадное существо охотится на {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добычу{/g}, но, когда ему наносят {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, прячется в укрытии в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Однако если на соседних клетках находятся 2 и более существ того же вида, это существо становится бесстрашным и перестает искать укрытия.
languages.original_text: This bloodthirsty creature hunts for {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} but hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} every time {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is dealt to it. If 2 or more creatures of the same kind are adjacent to it, the creature becomes fearless and stops hiding.

languages.text: この血に飢えた生物は{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}を狩るが、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が与えられるたびに1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}身を隠す。同種の生物が2匹以上隣接している場合、その生物は恐れを知らなくなり、隠れるのをやめる。
languages.original_text: This bloodthirsty creature hunts for {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} but hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} every time {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is dealt to it. If 2 or more creatures of the same kind are adjacent to it, the creature becomes fearless and stops hiding.

traits.locale_text: この血に飢えた生物は獲物を狩るが、ダメージが与えられるたびに1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g} 身を隠す。同種の生物が2匹以上隣接している場合、その生物は恐れを知らなくなり、隠れるのをやめる。

languages.text: 这只嗜血的生物会不断袭击猎物，但每当受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}之后，都会躲藏一{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。如果此生物周围至少有两只同类，则会变得无所畏惧，不再躲藏。
languages.original_text: This bloodthirsty creature hunts for {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} but hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} every time {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is dealt to it. If 2 or more creatures of the same kind are adjacent to it, the creature becomes fearless and stops hiding.

traits.locale_text: 这只嗜血的生物会不断袭击猎物，但每当受到伤害之后，都会躲藏一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。如果此生物周围至少有两只同类，则会变得无所畏惧，不再躲藏。

languages.text: Esta sanguinaria criatura caza {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presas{/g}, pero se esconde durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} cada vez que sufre {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daños{/g}. Si 2 o más criaturas de la misma especie están adyacentes, la criatura pierde el miedo y deja de esconderse.
languages.original_text: This bloodthirsty creature hunts for {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} but hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} every time {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is dealt to it. If 2 or more creatures of the same kind are adjacent to it, the creature becomes fearless and stops hiding.

traits.locale_text: Esta sanguinaria criatura caza presas, pero se esconde durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} cada vez que sufre daños. Si 2 o más criaturas de la misma especie están adyacentes, la criatura pierde el miedo y deja de esconderse.

languages.text: Diese blutrünstige Kreatur jagt {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g}, aber versteckt sich 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang immer wenn ihr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zugefügt wird. Wenn 2 oder mehr Kreaturen derselben Art an sie angrenzen, verliert die Kreatur jede Angst und versteckt sich nicht länger.
languages.original_text: This bloodthirsty creature hunts for {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} but hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} every time {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is dealt to it. If 2 or more creatures of the same kind are adjacent to it, the creature becomes fearless and stops hiding.

traits.locale_text: Diese blutrünstige Kreatur jagt Beute, aber versteckt sich 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang immer wenn ihr Schaden zugefügt wird. Wenn 2 oder mehr Kreaturen derselben Art an sie angrenzen, verliert die Kreatur jede Angst und versteckt sich nicht länger.

languages.text: Cette créature assoiffée de sang chasse sa {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}proie{/g} mais se cache pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} chaque fois qu'elle subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}. Si au moins deux créatures de la même espèce sont adjacentes à sa position, elle n'a plus peur et arrête de se cacher.
languages.original_text: This bloodthirsty creature hunts for {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} but hides for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} every time {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is dealt to it. If 2 or more creatures of the same kind are adjacent to it, the creature becomes fearless and stops hiding.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature assoiffée de sang chasse mais se cache pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} chaque fois qu'elle subit des dégâts. Si au moins deux créatures de la même espèce sont adjacentes à sa position, elle n'a plus peur et arrête de se cacher.
